attributes.action: Limit the term of a driving license to 5 years to ensure higher standards from continual assessment.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Few licenses to operate machinery as dangerous as motor vehicles allow for as long a term between re-assessments as the driving license.
If we had to be reassessed every five years, there would be no excuse for ignorance of changes in the law or lax attitudes to safety or standards.
Less accidents should mean lower insurance costs, so offsetting the cost of reassessment.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
